Subjects: Saunders, Laurence, of Coventry; occasional verse; historical poems; protest verse
_description: Verses on injustice against Laurence Saunders at Coventry (1496) — four 6-line stanzas (aabccb)

CovLeet.First Lines: Jhesu be your spedeI hope hit be nede…
CovLeet.Last Lines:
…both erly & latekepe well your patefor after
                    clappys
CovLeet.Editions:
Harris,  Mary Dormer,
                        ed.  
             The Coventry Leet Book.
             4 vols. in 2 
             EETS
         o.s. 134-5, 138, 146 (1907-13); repr. 1971: 577.
Kendall,  P. M. 
             The Yorkist Age.

Scattergood,  V. John. 
             Politics and Poetry in the Fifteenth Century.
         London: Blandford Press, 1971: 374.
